summary: All requirements have been successfully implemented. The backend exposes a generateImage function in Motoko returning the exact placeholder URL. The frontend provides a complete interface with text input, button, image display, and React Query integration. A cohesive warm earth-tone design theme (terracotta, cream, vibrant green) has been applied throughout, avoiding blue and purple as specified.

hallucinated_features.reason: The diff includes full Internet Identity authentication setup with useInternetIdentity.ts, InternetIdentityProvider, and authentication-aware actor creation. User authentication was explicitly listed as a non-goal in the BuildRequest.
A footer component with branding, copyright, and external link to caffeine.ai was added. This was not requested in any requirement.
Two CSS files define color palettes: frontend/src/index.css with warm earth tones (matching REQ-3) and frontend/index.css with a generic grayscale palette. The grayscale file appears unnecessary.
